, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.ENG_MEAN, A.CCH_NM, A.ORG_DS, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM, A.WD_DCD --, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' WHEN A.VRF_CD = '3' THEN '#FF8000' WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END AS FontColor , A.DMN_YN, A.STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_STWD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND VRF_CD IN ('1', '3')
ORDER BY RQST_SNO

STWD_PNM = UPPER(REPLACE(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},' ','')) ,

RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENG_MEAN = #{engMean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCH_NM = #{cchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DS = #{orgDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE WAQ_STWD
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD IN ('1', '3') AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE WAQ_STWD A SET (REG_TYP_CD, STWD_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN NULLIF(MAX(B.STWD_ID), '') IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.STWD_ID) AS STWD_ID FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM
AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 ) , VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 표준단어 존재....(WD011) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE D.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, '0') != '2' )

--검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 논리명중복 (동음이의어 통과) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

--검증쿼리 금칙어 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND COALESCE(A.STND_ASRT,'_') = COALESCE(D.STND_ASRT,'_') --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.SYMN_DCD ='NT' )
--검증쿼리 유사어 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.SYMN_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.SYMN_DCD ='SW' )

--검증쿼리 단어 물리명 유니크 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD ='C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_PNM = D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD E WHERE A.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = E.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != E.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.STWD_ID = A.STWD_ID UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND COALESCE(A.STND_ASRT,'_') = COALESCE(D.STND_ASRT,'_') --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS ( --금칙어는 별도로 분리
--표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 --NT:금지어
SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE D.SYMN_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.SYMN_DCD = 'RV' --RV:유사어 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND POSITION(' ' IN A.STWD_LNM) > 0
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND POSITION(' ' IN A.STWD_PNM) > 0
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.STWD_LNM) > 15
--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.STWD_PNM) > 25

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.STWD_PNM, ''), '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.STWD_PNM, ''),'_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.ENG_MEAN, ''),'_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.ENG_MEAN, ''),'_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.CCH_NM, ''),'_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.CCH_NM, ''),'_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.ORG_DS, ''),'_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.ORG_DS, ''),'_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.OBJ_DESCN, ''),'_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.OBJ_DESCN, ''),'_')
AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.STND_ASRT, ''),'_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(D.STND_ASRT, ''),'_') --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM != D.STWD_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = D.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 )
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN F WHERE A.STWD_LNM = F.SYMN_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = F.SYMN_PNM AND A.STND_ASRT = F.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND F.SYMN_DCD = 'HM' )
mapper.sql: , STWD_LNM , STWD_PNM , ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID, DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_STWD WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_STWD A SET (STWD_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.STWD_ID AS STWD_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_STWD A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_STWD A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 )
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD != 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_GOV_STWD D WHERE A.STWD_LNM = D.STWD_LNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) AND A.VRF_CD IN ('1', '4')

INSERT INTO WAQ_STWD( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,STWD_ID ,STWD_LNM ,STWD_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,ENG_MEAN ,CCH_NM ,ORG_DS ,WD_DCD ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,DMN_YN ,STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_STWD A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_STWD A SET ( ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD, DMN_YN , OBJ_DESCN, FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = (SELECT ENG_MEAN , CCH_NM , ORG_DS, WD_DCD, DMN_YN , OBJ_DESCN, FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT --표준구분추가 이베이코리아 190111 )
